title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Connecting with your personal network improves your creative efforts. Perhaps you have reached the limit of what is possible on your own. Additional support from your mentors or peers can help you launch your pursuits into an entirely different space. Mingle with people who share your passions, but also be receptive to explore new subjects of interest. Whatever you might sacrifice from not working exclusively on your own terms is minimal in comparison to the value of imaginative friends and their incredible insights. Author Amit Ray wrote, Collaboration is the essence of life. The wind, bees and flowers work together, to spread the pollen. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
